Name: location.latitude from Navixy
Notes: Direct mapping: Latitude in decimal degrees

Name: location.longitude from Navixy
Notes: Direct mapping: Longitude in decimal degrees

Name: location.precision.fix_quality from Navixy
Notes: Direct mapping: 0 - GNSS OFF 1 â€“ GNSS ON with fix 2 - GNSS ON without fix 3 - GNSS sleep 4 - GNSS ON with fix, invalid data

Name: location.precision.satellites from Navixy
Notes: Direct mapping: Number of satellites in fix

Name: location.precision.hdop from Navixy
Notes: Prioritized mapping: Horizontal Dilution of Precision

Name: location.precision.pdop from Navixy
Notes: Prioritized mapping: Position Dilution of Precision

Name: location.cardinal_direction from Navixy
Notes: Calculated field: Cardinal direction (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW)

Name: location.geocoded_address from Navixy
Computation Approach: Use external API (Google) to convert latitude and longitude into geocoded address.
Notes: Calculated field: Single string representation of the location

Name: location.last_changed_at from Navixy
Notes: Calculated field: Unix Epoch timestamp (milliseconds, number) when location/heading last changed significantly (threshold applied to filter GPS noise). Used for dwell-time calculations and "parked since X" features.
